events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under Engineering roles based on your experience and skills.
A recruiter specializing in technical positions has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process.
The initial screening interview was conducted successfully to discuss your software development experience and career goals.
Thank you for your thoughtful responses during the screening, and for confirming your availability for the next steps.
We have scheduled your technical interview to assess your coding skills and problem-solving approach with our engineering team.
